pages.title: Required Axe
pages.text: Some people just can't help themselves from punching trees. With a little encouragement they will be required to use an axe to chop any form of log. $(br2)Config: Enable / Disable

pages.title: Foraging
pages.text: When digging through dirt and its variants, there is a chance to find potatoes, carrots, and beets. Only the open hand or Flint, Bronze, Pewter, and Colored Gold tools are delicate enough to harves such crops. Any higher tier tool will not forage successfully. $(br2)Config: The chance for a vegetable to be found. Set to 0 to disable.

pages.title: Finding Flint
pages.text: Flint is a necessary part of the early-game, however getting flint from gravel is not very fun. Luckily, Flint, Bronze, Pewter, and Colored Gold tools are inefficient at mining and will drop flint occasionally from stone. $(br2)Config: The chance for a flint to be dropped. Set to 0 to disable.
